attributes.action: SAVE THE DUDLEY HIPPODROME FROM DEMOLITION
attributes.additional_details: The hippodrome would bring in so much revenue into Dudley. The metro would stop directly outside the theatre, a first for any in the uk, and is on the doorstep of many nightlife facilities. Please can you get this plan for it be demolished stopped
attributes.background: The historic Dudley Hippodrome is on the verge of being demolished for a new educational facility. Dudley has plenty of these already. An entertainment complex refurbished and re modernised, it would be available for groups and people of all ages, cultural and religious beliefs to use

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
